articles.title: EU will likely grant Ukraine candidate status to join bloc, says Ursula von der Leyen - The Guardian
articles.description: Volodymyr Zelenskiy has been pushing for rapid admission, and says the decision will determine the future of Europe
articles.content:
The EU executive will next week make a recommendation on whether Ukraine should be given candidate status to join the bloc, the European Commission president, Ursula von der Leyen, has said.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: EU welcomes Malaysia's move to abolish mandatory death penalty - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: The European Union (EU) has welcomed Malaysia's move to abolish the mandatory death penalty as an important step towards the complete abolition of capital punishment in line with worldwide trends.

articles.title: Remains of Europe's largest ever land predator dinosaur discovered - Leitrim Live
articles.description: The remains of Europe’s largest ever land-based hunter which measured more than 10 metres long and lived 125 million years ago have been found on the Isle of Wight. Several prehistoric bones belonging to the two-legged, crocodile-faced spinosaurid dinosaur we…
